rows.label: qst202602_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm back, old man. The Herridot
Laia...[ML:Dash ] it was certainly a tough one.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, you've already defeated it?
You haven't been wandering the
lands for nothing, I see.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0003
rows.name:
I don't want to hear your
compliments. Makes my skin crawl.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0004
rows.name: Still not very honest, are you...?[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202602_msg0005
rows.name:
Ten'i, you also did well.
As the King of Luxuria,
allow me to thank you.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0006
rows.name:
No, it was not by my strength alone.
It was because Rex was there.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0025
rows.name:
No, it was not by my strength alone.
It was because Nia was there.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0026
rows.name:
No, it was not by my strength alone.
It was because Zeke was there.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0027
rows.name:
No, it was not by my strength alone.
It was because Meleph was there.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0007
rows.name:
I see...[ML:Dash ] It seems entrusting
Ten'i to you was not a mistake.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0008
rows.name: I'm counting on you from now on.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0009
rows.name:
Leave it to me. Ten'i is
our precious companion!

rows.label: qst202602_msg0010
rows.name:
Now, this matter in Luxuria
is resolved, but...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202602_msg0011
rows.name:
things have begun to move in
an unexpected direction...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202602_msg0012
rows.name: What's with that hesitant tone?

rows.label: qst202602_msg0013
rows.name:
You have another favor
to ask, don't you?

rows.label: qst202602_msg0014
rows.name: You're quick on the uptake, Saika.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0015
rows.name:
Actually, the Herridot Laia you
defeated has also appeared in Invidia.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0016
rows.name: In Invidia as well...?[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202602_msg0017
rows.name:
I've received a request from
Queen Lagert of Invidia. She
wants you to help...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202602_msg0018
rows.name:
It seems the Invidian army
is having a hard time.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0019
rows.name:
The Herridot Laia would
certainly be a tough opponent
for an ordinary Driver.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0022
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]What do you say, Ten'i? Will you go?

rows.label: qst202602_msg0023
rows.name:
A direct request from the King.
I have no reason to refuse.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0032
rows.name:
By contributing to Alst, I may
be able to atone for my sins...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202602_msg0028
rows.name:
There's no need to be so
hard on yourself...[ML:Dash ] Queen
Lagert will be pleased.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0029
rows.name:
Go to Fons Maim Port in Invidia
and ask for the details.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0030
rows.name: Understood.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0031
rows.name: I'm counting on you.
